Name: Virus Buster
About the game: You can download DLC. The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents. / Protect women from dangerous viruses. Repel by hitting the vaccine. If you help, there is a nice gift from a beautiful woman. Game operation method: ・ The syringe moves when you move the mouse. ・ Click to fire the vaccine. ・ Successful when the vaccine hits the virus. ・ If successful three times, the beautiful girl will take off her clothes. ・ There are 5 stages. About the function: ・ Difficulty will become more difficult as you proceed. ・ On difficult stages, more beautiful girls take off their clothes. ・ We can play in peace by auto-save.
